Package provided.discovery

Interface IDiscoveryConnection

  • public interface IDiscoveryConnection
    Interface that provides static methods that enable an IDiscoveryManager to pulled down from the discovery server machine. Note that RMI operations require the use of the *local* IRMIUtils instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_BOUND_NAME
      The bound name of the IDiscoveryManager object
      static java.lang.String DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_IP_ADDR
      The default IP address of the discovery server machine.

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static IDiscoveryManager getDiscoveryManager​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils)
      Get a discovery manager from the default IP address The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
      static IDiscoveryManager getDiscoveryManagerAt​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils, java.lang.String ipAddr)
      Get a discovery manager from a specific IP address.

    • Field Detail

      • DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_BOUND_NAME

        static final java.lang.String DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_BOUND_NAME
        The bound name of the IDiscoveryManager object
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_IP_ADDR

        static final java.lang.String DISCOVERY_REGISTRY_IP_ADDR
        The default IP address of the discovery server machine.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDiscoveryManager

        static IDiscoveryManager getDiscoveryManager​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils)
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a discovery manager from the default IP address The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
        Parameters:
        rmiUtils - A *STARTED* IRMIUtils instance
        Returns:
        An IDiscoveryManager instance, already started.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - In the event of communications errors with the discover server

      • getDiscoveryManagerAt

        static IDiscoveryManager getDiscoveryManagerAt​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils,
                                               java.lang.String ipAddr)
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a discovery manager from a specific IP address. The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
        Parameters:
        rmiUtils - A *STARTED* IRMIUtils instance
        ipAddr - The IP address of the discovery server's Registry
        Returns:
        An IDiscoveryManager instance, already started.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - In the event of communications errors with the discover server
